F2) !!! Run the curl command in Terminal
requests.description:
curl -k -X POST "https://computing.cosmos.lab.fiware.org:13000/cosmos-auth/v1/token" -H "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded" -d "grant_type=password&username=FIWARE-LAB-USER-EMAIL@EMAIL.COM&password=FIWARE-LAB-USER-PASSWORD"

Please replace FIWARE-LAB-USER-EMAIL and FIWARE-LAB-USER-PASSWORD with your FIWARE Lab Credentials

Please replace FIWARE-LAB-USER-EMAIL and FIWARE-LAB-USER-PASSWORD with your FIWARE Lab Credentials
